GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with option to add queries to sort by only topic or author

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object which matches the given article_id from the request

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects which are all of the comments attached to a given article corresponding to its article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Takes a comment object consisting of username and body posts it linking it to an article based on passed article_id request parameter

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: takes an object which contains vote increment and updates the article to reflect the change in votes

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: takes a comment_id and deletes corresponding comment
